text: Ara atahpara yakhana hajjbera yabatiya anusthanakriyadi samapta kare sarabe, takhana smarana karabe allahake, yemana kare tomara smarana karate nijedera bapa-dadaderake; baram tara ceye'o besi smarana karabe. Tarapara aneke to bale ye para'oyadegara! Amadigake duniyate dana kara. Athaca tara jan'ye parakale kona ansa ne'i.
